body: @rhenwood-arm if we can easily cross-compile there we could do it I guess.
@rhenwood-arm btw if you do so you may also be interested in providing a pr for netty-tcnative.

Thanks for the prompt response and guidance @normanmaurer !

I'll spend some time looking into this in detail.

Hi @normanmaurer 
I am working with a colleague on this activity, so I've reached out to them to see where they are. Still waiting for an update.

NOTE: I am assuming that this is a 'nice to have' for the project today. Please let me know if you have observed other interest in this work which will help me prioritize it.
@rhenwood-arm you are right... nice to have and not urgent at all. Just wanted to see where we are here.
We are using netty on ARM64v8.   and waiting this very important feature.
Hi @rhenwood-arm do you have start some work around this topic ? I'm also interested to provide cross compilation for arm v7 32 bit architecture.

Hi,

I don't have time to work on this currently, but I will ask to see if I can get some help...

It looks like the EPEL 6 repository would need to be added to the release requirement to at least provide the GCC cross compilers for AArch64 and Armv7.

@normanmaurer would you be amenable to that?
